name: Crazy Cart (itch)
description:
A shopping cart has gone out of control, and it's you! But there's a problem: one of your wheels is loose, making it tricky to get anything done. Slam into everything in the store and bring it to the cash register to sell, and use that cash to buy repairs and upgrades!

Move: WASD / Arrow Keys

Jump (Once unlocked): Spacebar

Raygun (Once unlocked): Left Click

This is my first game jam as solo and my first publicly released game!

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020 - Out of Control
